title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1642 - Basic Instructions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1642 - Basic Instructions

State Regulations

Subpart 1642-1 - Bank Accounts (§ 1642-1.1 to 1642-1.6)

Subpart 1642-2 - Disbursement Procedure (§ 1642-2.1 to 1642-2.6)

Subpart 1642-3 - Books Of Account (§ 1642-3.1 to 1642-3.16)

Subpart 1642-4 - Tenant Accounting (§ 1642-4.1 to 1642-4.12)

Subpart 1642-5 - Security Deposits (§ 1642-5.1 to 1642-5.8)

Subpart 1642-6 - Insurance (§ 1642-6.1 to 1642-6.7)

Subpart 1642-7 - Inventories (§ 1642-7.1 to 1642-7.5)

Subpart 1642-8 - Payrolls And Labor Cost Distribution (§ 1642-8.1 to 1642-8.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1642

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §§14, 19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
